Paragraph: This result leads us to conclude that PTATDPP retains a higher crystalline nature in the blend with PC71BM , affording a better hole transporting pathway and thus exhibiting a higher J SC and FF than PTAFDPP.

1. Crystalline nature
2. J SC (short for short-circuit current density, which is a property in the context of solar cells)
3. FF (short for fill factor, which is a property in the context of solar cells)

2. J SC (short for short-circuit current density)
3. FF (short for fill factor)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This result leads us to conclude that PTATDPP retains a higher crystalline nature in the blend with PC71BM , affording a better hole transporting pathway and thus exhibiting a higher J SC and FF than PTAFDPP.

Let's think step by step.

1. "a higher crystalline nature" - The property value here is "a higher crystalline nature." This is a property that describes the structure of a material.
2. "a better hole transporting pathway" - The property value here is "a better hole transporting pathway." This is a property that describes the ability of a material to conduct holes, which are positive charges that move through a material in response to an electric field.
3. "a higher J SC" - The property value here is "a higher J SC." J SC is a common abbreviation for "short-circuit current density," which is a measure of the current flowing through a solar cell when it is short-circuited.
4. "a higher FF" - The property value here is "a higher FF." FF is a common abbreviation for "fill factor," which is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell. It is calculated as the ratio of the maximum power output of the cell to the product of the open-circuit voltage and short-circuit current.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "a higher crystalline nature" - This is a property value that describes the structure of a material.
2. "a better hole transporting pathway" - This is a property value that describes the ability of a material to conduct holes.
3. "a higher J SC" - This is a property value that describes the short-circuit current density of a solar cell.
4. "a higher FF" - This is a property value that describes the fill factor of a solar cell.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a higher crystalline nature |
| a better hole transporting pathway |
| a higher J SC |
| a higher FF |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
